ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(Patient3IsThePatientFromOutOfCountry__c,"Yes"), Patient3NotApplicable__c = False, OR( ISBLANK(Patient3GivenName__c), ISBLANK(Patient3Surname__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Given name and Surname Required for Out of Country Patients
